Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24259 affecting package freeglut for versions less than 3.4.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24259 affecting package freeglut for versions less than 3.4.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package freeglut is earlier than 3.4.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-24259
